// If current action deals HP damage... 如果技能是造成伤害

  var bonusRate = 0;

    // Add a flat +200 damage bonus. 这里是暴击伤害

  }
}

name: 灵魂连接
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Split the damage
value = Math.floor(value / $gameParty.aliveMembers().length);
// Start loop
for (var i = 0; i < $gameParty.aliveMembers().length; i++) {
var actor = $gameParty.aliveMembers()[i];
// Ignore actor if the actor is the target (= Don't damage the target twice)
if (actor === target) { continue };
// Actor loses HP
actor.gainHp(-value);
actor.startDamagePopup();
actor.clearResult();
// Collapse Actor if dead
if (actor.isDead()) { actor.performCollapse() };
};
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
// Split the damage
value = Math.floor(value / $gameParty.aliveMembers().length);
// Start loop
for (var i = 0; i < $gameParty.aliveMembers().length; i++) {
var actor = $gameParty.aliveMembers()[i];
// Ignore actor if the actor is the target (= Don't damage the target twice)
if (actor === target) { continue };
// Actor loses HP
actor.gainHp(-value);
actor.startDamagePopup();
actor.clearResult();
// Collapse Actor if dead
if (actor.isDead()) { actor.performCollapse() };
};
</Custom React Effect>

name: 反杀
note:
<Category: Bypass Death Removal>

<Custom Respond Effect>
// Check if the Destiny Bond target's HP is at 0.
if (target.hp <= 0) {
  // Remove the Destiny Bond state.
  target.removeState(stateId);
  // Get the death state for the attacker.
  var deathState = user.deathStateId();
  // Check if the attacker isn't immune to the death state and doesn't resist it.
  if (user.stateRate(deathState) > 0.01 && !user.isStateResist(deathState)) {
    // Play an animation on the attacker.
    user.startAnimation(65);
    // Set the attacker's HP to 0.
    user.setHp(0);
    // Check if the attacker is dead.
    if (user.isDead()) {
      // Make the attacker collapse.
      user.performCollapse();
    }
  }
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

  // Check if the user is an actor.
  if (user.isActor()) {
    // Get the sword weapon-type ID
    var swordTypeId = 2;
    // get the user's currently equipped weapons.
    var weapons = user.weapons();
    // Loop through each weapon
    for (var i = 0; i < weapons.length; ++i) {
      // Get the currently looped weapon
      var weapon = weapons[i];
      // Check if the weapon exists and if the weapon's type is a sword
      if (weapon && weapon.wtypeId === swordTypeId) {
        // Set the condition to true
        condition = true;
      }
    }
  }
}

<Custom Apply Effect>
// Default the user's stock heal value to 0. 默认情况下，用户的库存修复值为0。
user._stockHeal = user._stockHeal || 0;
// Add 2000 points to the stock heal amount. 在库存治疗金额上增加2000点。
user._stockHeal += 20000;
// Set the state counter to display the amount of HP stock heal will recover 设置状态计数器以显示HP库存修复将恢复的金额
user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._stockHeal);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Clear the stock heal value 清除库存治疗值
user._stockHeal = undefined;
// Set the state counter for the stock heal to 0 将库存治疗的状态计数器设置为0
user.setStateCounter(stateId, 0);
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Custom Regenerate Effect>
// Default the user's stock heal value to 0. 默认情况下，用户的库存修复值为0。
user._stockHeal = user._stockHeal || 0;
// Check if the user is alive and if the user's HP isn't full 检查用户是否处于活动状态，以及用户的HP是否已满
if (user.isAlive() && user.hpRate() < 1) {
  // Calculate the missing HP 计算缺少的HP
  var missingHp = Math.min(user.mhp - user.hp, user._stockHeal);
  // Decrease the stock heal amount 减少库存治疗量
  user._stockHeal -= missingHp;
  // Update the stock heal counter 更新库存修复计数器
  user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._stockHeal);
  // Gain the missing HP 找回缺失的HP
  user.gainHp(missingHp);
  // Start a damage popup 启动损坏弹出窗口
  user.startDamagePopup();
  // Clear the results 清除结果
  user.clearResult();
}
// Check if the stock heal is depleted 检查库存治疗是否耗尽
if (user._stockHeal <= 0) {
  // If it is, then remove the state 如果是，则删除该状态
  user.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Default the target's stock heal to 0 默认目标的库存治疗为0
target._stockHeal = target._stockHeal || 0;
// Check if the target is alive and if the target is missing any HP 检查目标是否处于活动状态，以及目标是否缺少任何HP
if (target.isAlive() && target.hpRate() < 1) {
  // Calculate the missing HP 计算缺少的HP
  var missingHp = Math.min(target.mhp - target.hp, target._stockHeal);
  // Decrease the stock heal value 降低库存治疗值
  target._stockHeal -= missingHp;
  // Update the stock heal counter 更新库存修复计数器
  target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._stockHeal);
  // Recover missing HP for the target 为目标恢复丢失的HP
  target.gainHp(missingHp);
  // Start a damage popup 启动损坏弹出窗口
  target.startDamagePopup();
  // Clear the target's results 清除目标的结果
  target.clearResult();
}
// Check if stock heal has run out 检查库存修复是否用完
if (target._stockHeal <= 0) {
  // If it has, remove the stock heal state 如果有，则移除库存治疗状态
  target.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

  // If it does, calculate the difference between the user's initial MP and the user's current MP after the cost.

The Truthseeker is a passive ability from Final Fantasy Record Keeper. When the user of the passive has a sword-type weapon equipped, the user will deal more damage overall. Here’s how to recreate the effect in RPG Maker MV!

You can grab the copy/paste code here: Insert the following Lunatic Mode code into your passive state’s notebox. Change the values in red to reflect your game’s settings.

<Custom Passive Condition>
// Set the default condition to false.
condition = false;
// Check if the party is in battle.
if ($gameParty.inBattle()) {
  // Check if the user is an actor.
  if (user.isActor()) {
    // Get the sword weapon-type ID
    var swordTypeId = 2;
    // get the user's currently equipped weapons.
    var weapons = user.weapons();
    // Loop through each weapon
    for (var i = 0; i < weapons.length; ++i) {
      // Get the currently looped weapon
      var weapon = weapons[i];
      // Check if the weapon exists and if the weapon's type is a sword
      if (weapon && weapon.wtypeId === swordTypeId) {
        // Set the condition to true
        condition = true;
      }
    }
  }
}
</Custom Passive Condition>

<Custom Confirm Effect>

  // Calculate the amount of bonus damage dealt

  // Add that to the finalized damage
  value += bonus;
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

<Custom React Effect>//每次该状态持有者被攻击或技能后执行.
if(value >= 100000000){//如果伤害大于等于状态持有者当前生命
	target.startAnimation(107);//状态持有者播放107号动画（自爆动画）
	var us = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();//设定变量us为攻击者活着的队友
	for(var i = 0;i<=us.length;++i){//循环0到us长度（攻击者队友数量）
	var u = us[i];//u为攻击者当前编号的队友
		if(u){//判断u存在
			u.gainHp(-2000);//给u造成伤害，伤害量为状态持有者50%最大生命值
			u.startDamagePopup();//u显示伤害
			if (u.isDead()){//如果u死亡
				u.performCollapse();//执行消失
			}
		u.clearResult();//刷新u
		}
	}
	target.removeState(26);//状态持有者移除26号状态（死亡自爆状态）
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: 振奋判断
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
if(user.isBattleMember() && user.isAlive()){
var allies = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
for (i = 0;i < allies.length;i++)
{
allies[i].addState(990);
}
}
</Custom Battle Effect>

name: 振奋
note:
<Custom Confirm Effect>
// If current action deals HP damage... 如果技能是造成伤害
if (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  // ...set the bonus damage to 设定增益数值
  var finalRate = 0.3;
  var bonusRate = 0;
  // Add the bonus damage to the current damage. 这里是最终伤害
  value += Math.ceil(value * finalRate);
  // Check if a critical hit happened. 检查是否发生了暴击
  if (target.result().critical) {
    // Add a flat +200 damage bonus. 这里是暴击伤害
    value += Math.ceil(value * bonusRate);
  }
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: 无极剑道
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
var weapon = user.weapons()[0];
if(weapon.wtypeId == 2){
user.gainTp(45);
}
</Custom Battle Effect>

<Custom Confirm Effect>
// Check if the user is an actor
if (user.isActor()) {
  // Make an empty pool for ranged weapon types.
  var rangedTypes = [];
  // Insert the ranged weapon TYPE ID's here.
  rangedTypes.push(2);
  // Get the user's first weapon.
  var weapon = user.weapons()[0];
  // Check if the weapon exists and if this action is an attack.
  if (weapon && this.isAttack()) {
    // Check if the ranged pool contains the current weapon's weapon type ID.
    if (rangedTypes.contains(weapon.wtypeId)) {
      // If it does, add the bonus damage.
      value += Math.ceil(value * 0.45);
    }
  }
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: 法伤次数加成(5次)
note:
<Custom Action Start Effect>
$gameVariables.setValue(500,Math.floor(target.mmp / 1000));
</Custom Action Start Effect>
<Custom Establish Effect>
var cishu = $gameVariables.value(500);
	if(cishu >= 5){
	cishu = 5}
if (value > 0 && this.isMagical()) {
	for(var i = 0;i <= cishu;i++){
var bonus = Math.random() * 0.4 - 0.2;
value += Math.round(value * bonus);
target.gainHp(-value); 
target.startDamagePopup();
target.clearResult();		
	}
}
	$gameVariables.setValue(500,0);
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: 学者
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
// Get all currently equipped weapons for the user. 为用户获取所有当前装备的武器。
var weapons = target.weapons();
// Set the swords variable. 设置刀剑变量。
var swords = 6;
var swordst = 10;
// Loop through each of the weapons. 循环遍历每种武器。
for (var i = 0; i < weapons.length; ++i) {
  // Get the currently looped weapon. 获取当前循环的武器。
  var weapon = weapons[i];
  // Check if the weapon exists and if the weapon type ID matches the sword ID. 检查武器是否存在以及武器类型ID是否与剑ID相匹配。
  if (weapon && weapon.wtypeId === swords || weapon && weapon.wtypeId === swordst) {
  target.addState(734)
  }
}
</Custom Battle Effect>
